text: Læw hawhna khxng brrda phu ptiseth sraththa nı hmu chn khxng khea di klaw khun wa “khea phu thi michı khır xun nxkcak pen puthuchn khn thrrmda chen deiyw kab phwk than pheiyng tæ khea txngkar thi ca thataw hı di den henux phwk than læa ha kxallxh thrng prasngkh læw nænxn phraxngkh ca thrng sng ma la xik ah lng ma rea mi khey diyin kha phud chen ni nı smay brrphburusʹ khxng rea tæ kal kxn ley
